byline.original: By ALEXANDER BURNS and MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM

abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's national advocacy group Progressive Agenda Committee is continuing with its ambitious liberal agenda despite number of setbacks it has suffered, including cancellation of presidential forum in Iowa due to lack of interest on part of Democratic candidates.
lead_paragraph: The disintegration of an Iowa forum was the most significant disappointment yet for Mayor Bill de Blasio’s Progressive Agenda Committee, an ambitious but halting enterprise.

headline.main: De Blasio’s Advocacy Group Pursues Ambitious Agenda Despite Setbacks
headline.print_headline: Despite Setbacks, de Blasio’s Advocacy Group Pursues Ambitious Agenda

snippet: The disintegration of an Iowa forum was the most significant disappointment yet for Mayor Bill de Blasio’s Progressive Agenda Committee, an ambitious but halting enterprise.
